sanskrit_verse:
लशुनं गृञ्जनं चैव पलाण्डुं कवकानि च ।
अभक्ष्याणि द्विजातीनाममेध्यप्रभवानि च ॥ ५.५॥
transliteration:
laśunaṁ gṛñjanaṁ caiva palāṇḍuṁ kavakāni ca |
abhakṣyāṇi dvijātīnāmamedhyaprabhavāni ca || 5.5||

Consciousness alignment: Food laws function to realign individual awareness with cosmic rhythm through disciplined consumption.
